summary: This module implements a fused 1‑dimensional batch‑normalization layer optimized for Conformer‑based speech models, serving as a drop‑in replacement for the standard BatchNorm1d with an added affine projection. It also provides utilities to automatically swap existing batch‑norm layers in a model with this fused version.
business_intent: Enhance the training speed, inference efficiency, and accuracy of automatic speech recognition and text‑to‑speech models by using a specialized batch‑norm implementation tailored for Conformer architectures.
